aka: Barley Field in Sam-bak Valley (Sambakgol boribat)
trans_title: Barley Field in Sam-bak Valley (Sambakgol boribat)
introduction: SYNOPSISIn mid-Chosun dynasty, the mountain village of Sambak was pretty much a widow's town because all the young, strong men of the village had been under requisition or at war. Under the menacing watch of Sambak village's landlord, Yun, the widows' livelihoods are being squeezed out. At night, the widows secretly satisfy themselves at the hut of Sambak Village's only available man, the idiot Sam-bong. Then one day at the market, Sam-bong coincidentally receives help from Yun's daughter-in-law, a woman whose virtue was known widely. Sam-bong adores the woman from afar and stops his nightly activities. Therefore, the widows of Sambak Village lose their only means of relieving their stress. Their hysteria become the cause of small and big commotions.故事在Isojo的中间，山村Sambaek Gool，由于战争期间的镇民入侵和吞并村庄，仍然是寡妇镇。生活在不断监视“Sambaek目标”的土地所有者Yunjin的寡妇，让她热情地坐在村里唯一一个笨蛋饭吧的小屋里。然后，在节日的那一天，接受婚姻的云金媳妇帮助的饭吧接过舞会，抓住了她的腰舞。通过这项工作，一个充满压力的村庄的寡妇是歇斯底里的，造成大小的混乱。
